title: Bug 13725: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
description: Bug 13725: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
OB: Open an editor on the fileorg.eclipse.swt.custom.StyledText.java from the source folder "Eclipse SWTCustom Widgets" in the project "org.eclipse.swt" in the open source repository. Select the end of the first line and add a space character to mark the file as dirty.
EB:
When performing the following steps on my (fast) machine:
1) Click on the close box in the editor tab.
2) Answer "no" to the "Do you want to save changes" dialog.
3) Double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it.

The above steps take about 8 seconds to complete. However, if I repeat steps 1) and 2), and then select "Revert" from the pop-up menu in the editor, it takes 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original.
SR: Investigate and optimize the performance of the "Revert" operation in the java editor to reduce the time taken to complete the operation.
